metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6459 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the will_paginate gem before3.0.5 for Ruby allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors involving generated pagination links.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6459` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-will-paginate - 3.0.5-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby-will-paginate package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.5-1').
